SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.commodity_id, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.create_date AS createDate, ci.title, ci.name as commodityName, ui.code, ui.name as username, ui.images FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci on (ci.id = ri.commodity_id) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.user_id = tu.USER_ID) WHERE ri.delete_flag = 0
AND ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.userName},'%')
ORDER BY ri.send_create DESC
